2501.09031.title: Synthetic Data and Health Privacy
2501.09031.paper_summary:
This Viewpoint discusses generative artificial intelligence and safeguarding
privacy by using synthetic data as a substitute for private health data.
2501.09031.paper_summary_zh: 此觀點探討生成式人工智慧以及使用合成資料取代私人健康資料以保護隱私。
2501.09031.author: Gwénolé Abgrall et.al.
2501.09031.authors: Gwénolé Abgrall, Xavier Monnet, Anmol Arora
